(I forgot to add this in my last post)


Imprisoner:



Imprisoner never used conventional comm. frequencies because they could be 
jammed, and unknowingly to him that was what was going on.  He opened a inner 
monologue comm. link with Zardus.

"Zardus, the CF was hit with friendly fire and the Maximals are firing 
heavily on me.  I can't handle much more.  Requesting permission to attack 
them fully."
